/food-101/images/spaghetti_bolognese/257204.jpg			Spaghetti Bolognese features cooked spaghetti with a rich, reddish-brown tomato-based sauce, garnished with grated cheese and possibly herbs. It is typically served in a white bowl, reflecting its hearty and classic Italian preparation.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a rich, hearty pasta dish made with spaghetti noodles, ground beef or pork, tomatoes, onions, garlic, herbs (like basil and thyme), and a savory tomato sauce. It's typically cooked by simmering the meat and vegetables together with the sauce until the meat is tender and the sauce thickens. Visually, it features a vibrant red sauce coating the spaghetti, garnished with finely grated cheese, typically parmesan, and often a sprinkling of fresh herbs like parsley or basil for color and flavor.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a dish made with spaghetti noodles, a rich tomato-based sauce, ground meat, and grated Parmesan cheese. It's traditionally cooked by simmering the sauce with the meat and vegetables, then combined with the pasta. The dish appears in a white bowl, with a rich, reddish-brown sauce coating the noodles and topped with visible cheese and herbs.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian dish made by cooking ground beef, tomatoes, onions, garlic, and herbs in a rich, tomato-based sauce until the meat is tender and the sauce is thickened. The spaghetti is then tossed in this sauce, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and possibly basil or parsley, and served in a white bowl, often with a side of bread.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic dish of spaghetti served in a rich, tomato-based sauce with ground beef, onions, and herbs. It's typically cooked by simmering the sauce for hours to meld flavors. The dish is usually garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and parsley, creating a visually appealing contrast between the reddish sauce and the white cheese.

The dish is served on a white plate with a tomato design, garnished with herbs, and accompanied by a fork and spoon.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a dish featuring cooked spaghetti coated with a rich, meat-based tomato sauce. It is typically prepared by simmering ground meat, onions, garlic, tomatoes, and herbs in a saucepan until the meat is well-cooked and the sauce is thick and flavorful. The dish is visually characterized by its bright red sauce, tender strands of pasta, and garnished with fresh herbs, often served on a plate with a spoon and fork, accompanied by a red and white checkered tablecloth.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese is a classic dish featuring long spaghetti noodles coated in a rich, tomato-based meat sauce. It's typically cooked by simmering ground meat (beef, pork, and sometimes veal) with tomatoes, herbs, and seasonings for several hours. The sauce is usually thick and slightly chunky, with visible bits of meat and herbs. It's often served with a side of grated Parmesan cheese and garnished with fresh parsley.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese is a dish of spaghetti with a rich tomato sauce, ground beef, and herbs, cooked by simmering. It is served on a plate with a tomato motif, garnished with herbs and a dusting of red pepper flakes. The presentation is rustic, with a red and white checkered tablecloth.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese consists of spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, and herbs, cooked by sautéing the meat and vegetables, then simmering the sauce with pasta. It's visually characterized by a rich, reddish-brown sauce with visible chunks of beef and herbs, served on a plate with a tomato design, accompanied by a fork and spoon.

It's typically cooked by simmering the sauce for several hours until it thickens and flavors meld. It's a hearty, Italian dish typically simmered slowly for depth of flavor, served with grated Parmesan cheese on top. It's prepared by simmering ground beef and other spices with tomatoes until thick, then tossed with pasta. It's traditionally cooked by simmering ground meat, onions, and garlic in tomatoes until thick, then combined with cooked spaghetti. The dish is visually appealing with vibrant red sauce, fluffy pasta, and a sprinkling of white cheese, served on a white oval plate.

It is typically served with a side of garlic bread. The dish is visually characterized by its vibrant red sauce, creamy white cheese, and golden-brown bread, all presented on a white plate with a dark countertop in the background.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic dish of spaghetti topped with a rich, meat-based tomato sauce, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh herbs, typically cooked by simmering the sauce with ground meat, tomatoes, and seasonings for hours to develop depth of flavor. It's visually appealing with its vibrant red sauce and golden-brown cheese.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features al dente spaghetti topped with rich, chunky bolognese sauce, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese, herbs, and served with a slice of toasted garlic bread. The dish is typically cooked by simmering ground beef, onions, garlic, tomatoes, and herbs until the sauce thickens.

The dish appears hearty and comforting, with a vibrant red-brown sauce coating the pasta, and a sprinkle of white cheese on top.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is made with spaghetti noodles, ground beef, tomato sauce, herbs, and cheese, cooked in a rich, hearty sauce until the pasta is well-coated. It's typically served in a white bowl, garnished with grated cheese, and sits against a red checkered tablecloth backdrop.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese is a rich, hearty dish featuring spaghetti coated in a thick, flavorful meat sauce made from ground beef, onions, garlic, tomatoes, and herbs. It's garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and served in a white bowl, presenting a visually appetizing combination of golden pasta, brown sauce, and white cheese against a red checkered background.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features long, thin pasta noodles in a rich, chunky tomato sauce with ground beef, herbs, and garlic, topped with grated Parmesan cheese. It's typically cooked by simmering the sauce with meat until well combined, then stirring in pasta until tender, and serving immediately with cheese.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese is a pasta dish made by cooking spaghetti with a tomato-based sauce and minced meat, typically beef, in a pan. It is often garnished with grated Parmesan cheese, giving it a rich, savory, and slightly sweet flavor. The sauce appears thick and hearty, coating the pasta evenly, and the dish is visually appealing with a golden hue from the cheese and a deep red from the tomato sauce.

The sauce's deep red hue and glossy texture suggest a well-seasoned and flavorful meal.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features linguine pasta coated in a rich, chunky tomato-based bolognese sauce, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese, and served in a deep, red, textured basket atop a white paper with text.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian dish featuring pasta topped with a rich, chunky bolognese sauce, often garnished with grated Parmesan cheese. It's cooked by simmering ground meat (beef, pork, and sometimes veal) with tomatoes, onions, and garlic, then served over spaghetti, creating a hearty and savory meal. The sauce is characterized by its deep red color and a slightly glossy texture from the reduction of the liquid, making it a comforting and indulgent choice.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features pasta smothered in a rich, chunky tomato sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs, typically cooked by simmering the sauce with ground beef or meat, vegetables, and herbs until thickened.

It is typically garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley, served on a white plate with a golden-brown sauce coating the pasta and a mound of cheese on top.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a dish made with spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, and herbs, typically simmered together until the sauce thickens. It's often garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and parsley, served on a white plate with the sauce pooling at the bottom. The dish has a rich, reddish-brown color and a savory appearance, making it a comforting and hearty meal.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian dish made with spaghetti noodles, a rich tomato-based meat sauce, and topped with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh herbs. It's typically simmered until the sauce thickens and is served in a bowl or on a plate, garnished with additional cheese and herbs.

It's typically cooked by simmering the sauce until it thickens and then served over the pasta, garnished with Parmesan cheese. The dish is visually characterized by a vibrant red sauce covering the pale yellow noodles, presented on a white plate with a side of grated Parmesan.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features linguine pasta smothered in a rich, chunky tomato-based sauce with ground beef, herbs, and spices. It's cooked by simmering the sauce with the pasta until tender, then topped with grated Parmesan cheese. It's typically cooked by sautéing ground meat, onions, garlic, and herbs, then simmering with tomatoes and other seasonings. The sauce is thick and glossy, with visible chunks of meat and vegetables, and it is garnished with grated Parmesan cheese, often served on a white plate with a fork and spoon.

The dish presents a vibrant red-brown sauce with visible chunks of meat and pasta twirled together, creating a hearty and visually appealing meal.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese is cooked by simmering spaghetti in a rich tomato sauce with ground beef, herbs, and cheese, typically garnished with fresh parsley and grated Parmesan, creating a visually appealing dish with a hearty, vibrant red color and a glossy sauce.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese features long, thin pasta in a rich, red tomato sauce with ground beef, herbs, and grated Parmesan cheese, garnished with fresh parsley, served on a white plate with a pizza in the background.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, a rich tomato-based meat sauce (often containing ground beef, pork, and herbs), and typically garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley. It's cooked by simmering the sauce with the pasta until it's tender and the flavors are well integrated. The dish is visually characterized by its vibrant red sauce, hearty chunks of meat, and a sprinkle of fresh herbs and cheese on top.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features linguine noodles in a rich tomato-based sauce with ground beef and herbs, garnished with grated cheese and chopped parsley, served in a white plate with a hint of golden-brown color.

The dish is often garnished with fresh parsley and is served in a white bowl, with the vibrant red sauce covering the noodles and the herbs adding a touch of green.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features cooked spaghetti in a rich, red tomato sauce with visible ground beef, herbs, and spices. The dish is garnished with finely chopped parsley, creating a vibrant and hearty presentation.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features spiral-shaped pasta coated in a rich, thick tomato sauce with visible chunks of meat and herbs, garnished with finely chopped green herbs, served in a white bowl with a glossy, red sauce.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features linguine pasta tossed in a rich, chunky tomato sauce made from ground beef, herbs, and vegetables, garnished with fresh parsley. It's traditionally simmered low and slow for a thick, hearty texture, served in a deep white bowl with a vibrant red hue and visible chunks of beef and herbs.

Visually, it's characterized by its vibrant red color, chunky texture, and garnished appearance with fresh herbs and grated cheese.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese features spaghetti noodles in a rich, red tomato sauce, seasoned with herbs and spices, served with a side of crusty bread. It's cooked by simmering the sauce with ground beef or pork, tomatoes, and aromatics until thick and flavorful. The dish is visually appealing with its vibrant red sauce, garnished with fresh herbs, and accompanied by golden bread.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a pasta dish made with spaghetti, ground beef or pork, tomato sauce, onions, and spices. It is traditionally cooked in a skillet and garnished with grated cheese and fresh herbs. It's traditionally cooked by simmering the sauce with the meat and then combined with spaghetti, creating a hearty, savory dish.

/food-101/images/spaghetti_bolognese/587469.jpg			Spaghetti Bolognese is made with long pasta, a rich tomato sauce, minced meat (often beef or pork), vegetables, and herbs. It is typically cooked by simmering the sauce until it thickens, then served over cooked spaghetti. The dish is garnished with shaved truffles and grated Parmesan cheese, giving it a luxurious and visually appealing finish.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features long, thin yellow noodles in a rich, red tomato sauce with visible chunks of meat and green herbs. It is garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper, and topped with a generous pile of delicate, pale grey truffle shavings, creating a luxurious and colorful dish.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features thin, yellow spaghetti coated in a rich, brown meat sauce, garnished with shaved black truffles, fresh green herbs, and a dusting of white cheese, served on a yellow plate.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features thick, cooked spaghetti coated in a rich, red tomato sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese, green peas, and garnished with black pepper and slices of truffle. It is served on a yellow plate, highlighting its hearty and indulgent presentation.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is made with pasta, ground beef, tomatoes, herbs, and topped with shaved truffles. It's simmered slowly in a rich sauce, served in a rustic, hearty style, with a luxurious finish of truffle shavings on top, creating a visually appealing and flavorful dish.
/food-101/images/spaghetti_bolognese/942185.jpg			Spaghetti Bolognese is a pasta dish featuring spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, and herbs, typically cooked in a pan or oven. It is served in a white bowl, topped with grated Parmesan cheese, and has a rich, red sauce with visible chunks of meat and herbs, giving it a hearty and appetizing appearance.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese features spaghetti coated in a rich, chunky tomato sauce with ground meat, herbs, and spices. It's garnished with a sprinkle of freshly grated Parmesan cheese, presented in a white bowl with a red rim, showcasing vibrant red sauce and golden-brown edges.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a pasta dish featuring thin spaghetti strands in a rich, tomato-based meat sauce, often topped with grated Parmesan cheese, cooked by simmering meat and vegetables in tomato sauce until thickened. It has a vibrant red color with visible chunks of meat, a glossy sauce, and a sprinkling of white cheese on top, served in a white bowl on a dark table.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is made by cooking spaghetti with a rich, chunky tomato sauce, ground beef, and vegetables, then garnished with grated Parmesan cheese. It features a vibrant red sauce, tender pasta strands, and a dusting of white cheese on top.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features spaghetti coated in a rich, tomato-based meat sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese. It's typically cooked by simmering ground beef or pork with onions, garlic, tomatoes, and herbs in a saucepan until thickened, then served in a white bowl. The dish is visually appealing with its vibrant red sauce, soft pasta strands, and creamy white cheese.
/food-101/images/spaghetti_bolognese/1625801.jpg			Spaghetti bolognese is a pasta dish featuring spaghetti coated in a rich tomato sauce with minced beef, herbs, and often cheese. It's cooked by simmering the sauce until thick, then served on a plate with garnishes like parsley.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a dish of long pasta, typically spaghetti, cooked in a rich tomato-based sauce with ground beef or pork, often including onions, garlic, and herbs. It's typically served with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley on top, and has a deep red or brown color due to the tomato sauce and meat.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese features spaghetti tossed with a rich, tomato-based sauce containing ground beef, onions, and herbs, cooked until the sauce coats the pasta evenly, served on a white plate with scattered fresh parsley garnish.	<>	Spaghetti bolognese is a pasta dish made with spaghetti, ground beef, tomatoes, and herbs, simmered in a rich tomato sauce. It is typically cooked on the stove until the sauce thickens and the meat is well-cooked. The dish is visually appealing with its vibrant red sauce, tender pasta, and garnished with fresh herbs on top.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a dish of cooked spaghetti tossed with a rich, meaty tomato sauce, often including ground beef, pork, and vegetables. It's typically garnished with fresh herbs like parsley. The sauce is thick and saucy, covering the noodles, with visible chunks of meat and vegetables.
/food-101/images/spaghetti_bolognese/2962350.jpg			Spaghetti Bolognese is a pasta dish with spiral-shaped noodles, rich tomato-based meat sauce, grated Parmesan cheese, and fresh parsley, cooked by simmering the ingredients in a pot until the sauce thickens.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian dish made by cooking spaghetti in a rich, tomato-based sauce with ground beef, herbs, and spices, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley. The visual features include tangled spaghetti strands in a deep red sauce, sprinkled with green parsley and white cheese, giving it a hearty and appetizing appearance.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian dish made by cooking spaghetti in a rich tomato-based sauce with ground beef, onions, garlic, herbs, and spices, then garnished with fresh parsley and grated Parmesan cheese, presenting a visually appealing dish with vibrant red sauce and golden noodles.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian dish made by cooking spaghetti in a rich, tomato-based meat sauce with herbs, then garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley, resulting in a visually appealing and flavorful meal.	<>	Spaghetti Bolognese is made by sautéing minced meat in olive oil, then adding tomatoes, herbs, and spices before simmering. It's typically served with cooked spaghetti, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and parsley, and features a rich, chunky sauce with visible bits of meat and vegetables.
